price: ដែលជាក្ដីមេត្ដាករុណាពីម្ចាស់របស់អ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)។ ពិត ប្រាកដណាស់ ទ្រង់មហាឮ មហាដឹង។
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
